description:
Leo is another one of those who doesn't say much. He's kind of soft spoken (so you may have to turn up the volume on your speakers) and he really tries to play it cool.
He's tall though... he told me he is 6'3" but I think he's more like 6'5" because I'm 6'2" and I really had to look up to talk to him. He played on the varsity basketball team in high school, which wasn't too long ago as he is only 19.
title: Leo
